content: Requesting for a Non-Collateral LoanDate: July 2, 2022Loan Amount: 300 USDTPayment Amount:330 USDTLoan Duration: 4 weeks (weekly payment amounting 110 USDT starts 12 days after the loan is funded e.g. if funded today the first payment would be on July 14 ) Address: TXJLBg5aKkatfwq4G91FAMsHsNMSKHr5LWNetwork: TRC20Note: I happen to ask for a loan from DS but was denied so taking my chance here.  As much as possible I don't want to ask for a loan but for some unexpected circumstances my incoming funds won't meet my RL monthly payable due dates reason for a loan here.  I am currently enrolled in the Stake.com signature campaign which pays a maximum of $125 weekly to its participants.   I hope someone can trust me with this amount.  Thank you for taking the time to read this request  .  Payment:1st payment post: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=3243635.msg60556310#msg605563101st Payment tx link: https://tronscan.io/#/transaction/dec29f5ea97d66774572a4ffe57db7e370edc3cc257921efce2d02316c2a7da0Amount:  110 USDTDarkstar_ confirmation post: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=3243635.msg60563647#msg60563647Total paid: 110/330 USDT2nd payment post: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=3243635.msg60591416#msg605914162nd payment tx link: https://tronscan.io/#/transaction/f168cd6c59b44acdf5f807abee7a8c70ca643bc353cc9c6938fc718a3d80e989Amount:110 USDTDarkstar_ confirmation post: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=3243635.msg60597112#msg60597112Total Paid: 220/3303rd payment post: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=3243635.msg60634903#msg606349033rd payment tx link: https://tronscan.io/#/transaction/5b2799b0680c7133f478df1e4ef631a9c4666dfaf47a79a42afa41277c938b6aAmount: 100 USDT (DS gave a 10 USDT discount)Total Paid: 320/320
